basic_static_string::replace (7 of 14 overloads)

Replace a part of the string.

Synopsis 
constexpr basic_static_string&
replace(
    size_type pos,
    size_type n1,
    size_type n2,
    value_type c);
Description

Replaces rcount characters starting at index pos with n2 copies of c, where rcount is std::min(n1, size() - pos).

Exception Safety

Strong guarantee.

Remarks

All references, pointers, or iterators referring to contained elements are invalidated. Any past-the-end iterators are also invalidated.

Return Value

*this

Parameters

Name

Description

pos

The index to replace at.

n1

The number of characters to replace.

n2

The number of characters to replace with.

c

The character to replace with.

Exceptions

Type

Thrown On

std::length_error

size() + (n2 - rcount) > max_size()

std::out_of_range

pos > size()
